ground_truth_reviews.comment: The current validation logic `if not post_create.title and not post_create.content:` is incorrect. It only raises an exception if *both* the title and content are missing. The check should fail if *either* of them is empty to prevent posts with no title or no content. The condition should be changed to use `or` instead of `and`: `if not post_create.title or not post_create.content:`.

title: feat: Add validation for new post creation
body: This MR adds a validation step to the post creation endpoint to ensure that incoming requests for new posts contain a title and content before processing.
